value.title: Image Analysis 4.0 with new API endpoint and OCR model in preview
value.excerpt: We are thrilled to announce the preview release of Computer Vision Image Analysis 4.0 which combines existing and new visual features such as read optical character recognition (OCR), captioning, image classification and tagging, object detection, people detection, and smart cropping into one API.

value.title: 1 in 10 Americans over 65 have dementia, study finds
